text:
[Verse]
Feel the drops fall
On my skin now
Twirl and spin here
Can't slow down

[Verse 2]
Hear the rhythm
Of the splashes
Feet are moving
Lost in flashes

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Life without the pain
Let it fall let it pour
We don't care anymore

[Bridge]
Hopes and dreams rise
Under grey skies
With every step we
Find our way free

[Verse 3]
Heartbeats racing
Puddle chasing
Caught up in this
Rain embracing

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Life without the pain
Let it fall let it pour
We don't care anymore
title: Dancing In The Rain
